direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods test connectivity to the Rest API but return different information (ping returns an empty response, time returns the server time).
Both methods access the Binance API to retrieve information, but exchangeInfo provides more detailed exchange information.
Both methods use the requestHandler to send public requests with similar control flows and parameter handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the requestHandler to be initialized for sending API requests.
Environment setup is required before sending any API requests, including ping.
Both methods need to verify the response from the API to handle any exceptions or errors.
